actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to provide small business with increased management assistance.
short_title: Small Business Management and Productivity Assistance Act

summary.text: Small Business Management and Productivity Assistance Act - Amends the Small Business Act to authorize the Small Business Administration (SBA) to make grants to colleges and universities, States, State-chartered development credit corporations, or to any corporation formed by two or more of the above mentioned entities for studies, research, and counseling concerning the management, financing, productivity, and operation of small business enterprises. Permits the SBA to provide technical and managerial assistance to small business concerns, including advice with respect to increasing productivity.

titles.title: Small Business Management and Productivity Assistance Act
A bill to amend the Small Business Act to provide small business with increased management assistance.
